chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Si
awesome! i'm at the starting point, there's a twig leading to a small island with a tiger on it
where do i go next?

Cross the twig, once you cross the twig, you will need to go straight until you see a rock. Once you see the rock, you will see another twig behind it. You will have to cross the twig where you will land on another island.
got it, after crossing the twig i see the rocks
now i just crossed the second twig and i'm on another island. what's next?
You will make a right and go around the group of trees which should be full of parrots until you see elephants on your right side
right, i see the parrots and the elephant is there on my right side
where to now?
Make a slight left until you see three big rocks creating a path to another island
alright, i see the 3 big rocks, and now i'm heading to the new island
what's up after that?
You will see frogs straight ahead. Go straight until you see a dead end with a tree, and then make a Uturn and go straight until you see an alligator
aight, gone past the frog, made the u-turn at the dead tree, and now i see the crocodile!
Yes, sorry the crocodile. You will cross on top of the crocodile until you see a big boulder rock. Cross the rock and you will see the elephants again
no worries! just crossed over the crocodile, scrambled over the big rock and hello elephants again! now, where to?
Make a left towards the two big rocks and cross them where you will see giraffes
made a left, crossed the rocks and spotted the giraffes! what should i do next?
hola, you ready?
Si, lets go
great! step from where the white dog is sitting
head a bit to your left, towards a wooden bench, then cross the trail
Thank you, where do i go next?
now, u-turn left and cross back over the trail
we're heading back towards our starting doggie friend!
Go it, I am back
awesome! now, more excitement awaits! cross the branch to your south and keep going down the path
you'll reach another white dog chilling by a picnic blanket
Reached the other white dog
great job! now, let's continue our journey
go over the picnic mat, don't forget to touch the bowl of berries as you pass!
Perfect, just passed th bow of berries
good stuff! let's keep the ball rolling. head west towards the river
find the branch and cross it to the north. we're almost there!
Just passed the branch
nice! you're doing really well
try not to touch the green bush ahead. instead, circle it from the right side
I just went around it
perfecto! let's take the next step
aim towards the florist's stand
I am here
fantastic! ready to move on? let's take a left under the stand and head towards a big bridge, there are two cyclists there!
Yes, I am next to them
good job! now, continue west past the bridge
I see a cabbage stand
whoops, wrong way! you may have gone a bit too far
backtrack a bit until you spot two elderly folks on a bench, they're sitting just past the bridge
I am by the elderly folks
great! now, follow the path south a bit
you'll see a bush by the end of a wooden branch
OK, I am here
you're doing fantastic! you ready for the next step?
Su
awesome! go east between the branch and the bush
*si
fantastic, just a few more steps! look out for a brown young deer nearby
you're doing great so far!
hola, q tal? ready to go?
SI, let
cool, i'm at the tent up north
where to first, amigo?
While standing with the rocks your left and the bush on your right, walk straight till you see a dog
alright, i see the pup
is he on my path or should i keep going south?
Make a slight left around the puppy until you see fire
gotcha, now i'm facing the fire
keep making a slight left around the fire until you see the mushrooms
oh i see the red mushroom
which way to the car?
Yes, but then make a right to get on the path and walk south
ok, passed the mushroom, now i see the blue car
would i keep heading south?
yes keep heading south until you see the telescope
alright, i see the telescope, it's blue!
yes, cross it until you are back on the path
back on the path after the telescope, now what?
go west until you see a cabin house
got it, i see the wooden house
we are *finished*, no?
hola, q tal? ready to play?
Si!
I am ready
awesome! you see those three palm trees? go under the first one, turn right past the second, then take a sharp left just before the third one
head straight from there
great! now, see that puppy? just pass him on his left, make a slight left and head south
you got this!
Yes
perfect! now, ahead, you’ll see a big rock on your left and a little one on your right
sneak right between them and you'll hit the sea. don't get your feet wet yet!
see the crab
hey, nice job! make a right at that crab and follow the big rock along in the water
we're going west!
Do i keep going straight?
not quite! after the third rock, you'll see a shark
just after that, make a sharp turn right
I see the shark
brilliant! now, head back to the shore, sneak between the rock and the tri-coloured ball, and march north
I see a speaker
cool! make a slight left and slip between the red tent on your left and the speaker on your right
I did, what is next?
great job! now make a half circle around the tent and head south
see that red kayak near the shore? head towards it. don't get in the water yet!
I am at the kayak
nicely done! now turn right, move along the kayak till you reach a small green bush
and. you've made it!

general_survey.answer: Yes. My home language was spanish, but it was not until I reached school age in the USA, that I started speaking and learning English

general_survey.answer: I wish that the instructions were also given in a mix of english and spanish.
